DrawMode.line1: Provides 12 different styles of brushes, including Basic Brush, Rainbow Brush, Multi-Shape Brush, Multi-Material Brush, Pixel Brush, Multi-Color Brush, Text Brush, Multi-Line Connection Brush, Reticulate Brush, Multi-Point Connection Brush, Wiggle Brush, Thorn Brush. Satisfy the diversified drawing
DrawMode.line2: All brushes support color and brush width configurations
DrawMode.line3: MultiShape allows flexible configuration of shape types and quantities
DrawMode.line4: Material and MultiColor allows you to adjust the material type of the brush
DrawMode.line5: Text drawing support for cyclic text and font configuration

EraserMode.line1: Eraser mode linearly erases all content

SelectMode.line1: In selection mode, you can click on the content of the drawing to select it
SelectMode.line2: Click handle supports drag and drop, zoom and rotate operations, providing flexible editing options
SelectMode.line3: Selecting images supports multiple filter configurations
SelectMode.line4: Support for font configuration when selecting text
SelectMode.line5: Layer settings are supported for all drawings, including Move Layer Up, Move Layer Down, Move to Top, and Move to Bottom

BoardMode.line1: Drawing board support for configuring background color and transparency configurations

BorderConfig.line1: The bottom left button shows the current zoom ratio in real time, click it to reset the zoom ratio
BorderConfig.line2: The list of buttons in the center, in order from left to right, are: Undo, Redo, Copy Current Selection, Delete Current Selection, Draw Text, Upload Image, Clear Drawing, Save as Image, and Open File List
BorderConfig.line3: PC: Hold down the Space key and click the left mouse button to move the canvas, scroll the mouse wheel to realize the canvas zoom, hold down the Backspace key to delete the selected content, and hold down the Ctrl + V keys to paste the clipboard image at the same time
BorderConfig.line4: Mobile: support for dragging and zooming the canvas after a two-finger press

FileConfig.line1: Multi-file configuration: support multiple canvas switching, each canvas can be customized title, add, delete, and provide upload and download

boardConfig.cacheTip: In the presence of a large amount of drawing content, enabling caching will improve drawing performance, while disabling caching will improve canvas sharpness
